sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import style from './Form.module.css' import Image from './img/Rick_y_Morty_Serie_de_TV-157026175-large.jpg' import Validation from './validation' const Form = (props) => { const [userData , setUserData ] = useState({ email:"", password:"" }); const handleChange = (event) => { const property = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setErrors(Validation({ ...userData,[property]:value })) setUserData({...userData, [property]:value}) } const [errors , setErrors] = useState({ email:"", password:"" }) return(
{errors.email}
{errors.password}
) } export default Form
